params.name: data
params.description: The data array that holds all matrix values.

Vec2.name: Vec2
Vec2.description: Describes a vector with two components.

Vec3.name: Vec3
Vec3.description: Describes a vector with three components.

Vec4.name: Vec4
Vec4.description: Describes a vector with four components.

classitems.description: Initializes the matrix with the given values in given order.
classitems.name: init

classitems.description: Initializes the matrix with the given values. The values are read in row major order.
classitems.name: initRowMajor

classitems.description: Initializes all components of this matrix with the given number.
classitems.name: initWith

params.name: number
params.description: The number to set all matrix components to.

classitems.description: Initializes the components of this matrix to the identity.
classitems.name: initIdentity

classitems.description: Initializes this matrix from another matrix.
classitems.name: initFrom

classitems.description:
Reads a buffer starting at given offset and initializes the elements of this matrix.
The given buffer must have at least 16 elements starting at given offset.
The elements are expected to be in column major layout.
classitems.name: initFromBuffer

classitems.description: Initializes this matrix from given quaternion.
classitems.name: initFromQuaternion

classitems.description: Initializes this matrix to a rotation matrix defined by given axis vector and angle.
classitems.name: initAxisAngle

params.name: axis
params.description: The axis vector. This is expected to be normalized.

classitems.description: Initializes this matrix to a rotation matrix defined by given yaw pitch and roll values.
classitems.name: initYawPitchRoll

params.name: yaw
params.description: Angle in radians around the Y axis

params.name: pitch
params.description: Angle in radians around the X axis

params.name: roll
params.description: Angle in radians around the Z axis

classitems.description: Initializes this matrix with a rotation around the X axis.
classitems.name: initRotationX

classitems.description: Initializes this matrix with a rotation around the Y axis.
classitems.name: initRotationY

classitems.description: Initializes this matrix with a rotation around the Z axis.
classitems.name: initRotationZ

return.description: Reference to `this` for chaining.* @return {Mat4} This matrix for chaining.

classitems.description: Initializes a translation matrix.
classitems.name: initTranslation

classitems.description: Initializes a scale matrix.
classitems.name: initScale

classitems.description: Initializes a rotation matrix by using a position and a lookat point.
classitems.name: initLookAt

params.name: pos
params.description: The position where the viewer stands

params.name: lookAt
params.description: The position where the viewer is looking to

params.name: up
params.description: The up vector of the viewer

classitems.description: Initializes a matrix from a position point and a forward and up vectors
classitems.name: initWorld

classitems.description: Initializes a perspective matrix with given field of view angle
classitems.name: initPerspectiveFieldOfView

params.name: fov
params.description: The field of view angle in radians

classitems.description: Initializes a perspective matrix
classitems.name: initPerspective

classitems.description: Initializes a perspective matrix
classitems.name: initPerspectiveOffCenter

classitems.description: Initializes an orthographic matrix
classitems.name: initOrthographic

classitems.description: Initializes an orthographic matrix
classitems.name: initOrthographicOffCenter

classitems.description: Creates a copy of this matrix
classitems.name: clone

classitems.description: Copies the components successively into the given array.
classitems.name: copy

params.name: offset
params.description: Zero based index where to start writing in the array

classitems.description: Returns an array filled with the values of the components of this vector
classitems.name: dump

classitems.description: Checks for component wise equality with given matrix
classitems.name: equals

return.description: true if components are equal, false otherwise

classitems.description: Transform the given vector with this matrix.
classitems.name: transform

classitems.description: Rotates and scales the given vector with this matrix.

classitems.description:
Creates a new quaternion. The method should be called with four or no arguments. If less than four arguments are given
then some components of the resulting quaternion are going to be `undefined`.

classitems.description:
Creates a new vector. The method should be called with three or no arguments. If less than three arguments are given
then some components of the resulting vector are going to be `undefined`.

return.description: The given `out` parameter or a new vector.

classitems.name: normalize

return.description: The given `out` parameter or a new vector.

classitems.description: Inverts the given vector.
classitems.name: invert

return.description: The given `out` parameter or a new vector.

classitems.description: Negates this vector.
classitems.name: negate

return.description: The given `out` parameter or a new vector.

classitems.description: Adds two vectors.
classitems.name: add

return.description: The given `out` parameter or a new vector.

classitems.description: Adds a scalar to each component of a vector.
classitems.name: addScalar

return.description: The given `out` parameter or a new vector.

classitems.description: Subtracts the second vector from the first.
classitems.name: subtract

return.description: The given `out` parameter or a new vector.

classitems.description: Subtracts a scalar from each component of a vector.
classitems.name: subtractScalar

return.description: The given `out` parameter or a new vector.

classitems.description: Multiplies two vectors.
classitems.name: multiply

return.description: The given `out` parameter or a new vector.

classitems.description: Multiplies a scalar to each component of a vector.
classitems.name: multiplyScalar

return.description: The given `out` parameter or a new vector.

classitems.description: Divides the components of the first vector by the components of the second vector.
classitems.name: divide

return.description: The given `out` parameter or a new vector.

classitems.description: Divides the components of the first vector by the scalar.
classitems.name: divideScalar

params.name: scalar
params.description: The scalar to use for division.

return.description: The given `out` parameter or a new vector.

classitems.description: Multiplies two vectors and adds the third vector.
classitems.name: multiplyAdd

params.name: add
params.description: The vector to add on top of the multiplication.

return.description: The given `out` parameter or a new vector.

classitems.description: Multiplies a vector with a scalar and adds another vector.
classitems.name: multiplyAdd

params.name: add
params.description: The vector to add on top of the multiplication.

return.description: The given `out` parameter or a new vector.

classitems.description: Performs a component wise clamp operation on the the given vector by using the given min and max vectors.
classitems.name: clamp

params.name: min
params.description: Vector with the minimum component values.

params.name: max
params.description: Vector with the maximum component values.

return.description: The given `out` parameter or a new vector.

classitems.description: Performs a component wise clamp operation on the the given vector by using the given min and max scalars.
classitems.name: clampScalar

return.description: The given `out` parameter or a new vector.

classitems.description: Performs a component wise min operation on the the given vectors.
classitems.name: min

return.description: The given `out` parameter or a new vector.

classitems.description: Performs a component wise min operation on the the given vector and a scalar value.
classitems.name: minScalar

return.description: The given `out` parameter or a new vector.

classitems.description: Performs a component wise max operation on the the given vectors.
classitems.name: max

return.description: The given `out` parameter or a new vector.

classitems.description: Performs a component wise max operation on the the given vector and a scalar value.
classitems.name: maxScalar

return.description: The given `out` parameter or a new vector.

classitems.description: Performs a component wise linear interpolation between the given two vectors.
classitems.name: lerp

params.name: t
params.description: The interpolation value. Assumed to be in range [0:1].

return.description: The given `out` parameter or a new vector.

classitems.description: Performs a component wise barycentric interpolation of the given vectors.
classitems.name: barycentric

params.name: t1
params.description: The first interpolation value. Assumed to be in range [0:1].

params.name: t2
params.description: The second interpolation value. Assumed to be in range [0:1].

return.description: The given `out` parameter or a new vector.

classitems.description: Performs a component wise smooth interpolation between the given two vectors.
classitems.name: smooth

params.name: t
params.description: The interpolation value. Assumed to be in range [0:1].

return.description: The given `out` parameter or a new vector.

classitems.description: Tries to converts the given data to a vector
classitems.name: convert
